net.alomax.math

Class Cmplx

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.alomax.math.Cmplx

  • public final class Cmplx
extends java.lang.Object
    A class to represent complex numbers

      • exp

        public static final Cmplx exp(Cmplx c)
        Returns Euler's number e raised to the power of a complex value.
        Parameters:
        c - a complex value.
        Returns:
        the value e^c, where e is the base of the natural logarithms.

      • exp

        public static final Cmplx exp(double r,
                              double i)
        Returns Euler's number e raised to the power of a complex value.
        Parameters:
        r, - i the real and imaginary parts of a complex value.
        Returns:
        the value e^c, where e is the base of the natural logarithms.

      • fft

        public static final Cmplx[] fft(float[] fdata)
        Returns the complex array forward Fast Fourier Transform of a float array. The complex array will have a length that is the smallest power of 2 greater than or equal to the length of the float array.
        Parameters:
        fdata - the float array.
        Returns:
        the complex transform array.

      • fftInverse

        public static final float[] fftInverse(Cmplx[] cdata,
                                       int nPoints)
        Returns the float array inverse Fast Fourier Transform of a complex array.
        Parameters:
        cdata - the complex array.
        nPoints - the desired length of the float array.
        Returns:
        the first nPoints of the float transform array.

      • four1

        public static final double[] four1(double[] data,
                                   int isign,
                                   int nPoints)
        Returns the Fast Fourier Transform of a pseudo-complex double array representing an array of complex pairs. (adapted from Numerical Recipies in C)
        Parameters:
        data - the input double array.
        isign - FFT direction. (isign=1: returns forward FFT of data. isign=-1: returns inverse FFT or data.)
        Returns:
        the first transformed double array.

      • log

        public static Cmplx log(Cmplx z)
        Returns the natural logarithm (base e) of a complex number.
        Parameters:
        z - a complex number.

      • asinh

        public static Cmplx asinh(Cmplx z)
        Returns the arc hyperbolic sine of a complex number, in the range of (- through , -/2 through /2).
        Parameters:
        z - a complex number.
